title: Are immigrant workers bad for the working class?
itunes:title: Are immigrant workers bad for the working class?
description: Populists on the Left and Nativists on the Right seem to agree on one thing: that a ready supply of immigrant workers is undermining American workers. But with unemployment at new lows, are US workers just scapegoating immigrants?
itunes:summary: Populists on the Left and Nativists on the Right seem to agree on one thing: that a ready supply of immigrant workers is undermining American workers. But with unemployment at new lows, are US workers just scapegoating immigrants?
media:description: Populists on the Left and Nativists on the Right seem to agree on one thing: that a ready supply of immigrant workers is undermining American workers. But with unemployment at new lows, are US workers just scapegoating immigrants?
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: DACA,e-Verify,minimum wage,unskilled labor,automation,President Trump,Ralph Northum,Ed Gillespie,Alabama senate race,Roy Moore,sexual harassment,Richard Shelby,media
